name: Six Stack
description:
Bought a High End Mobile? Fed up with the mobile games you download arn't taking advatage of your phones full potential ? ! Well Random Precision Software try and make full use of the power of mobiles. With amazing graphics and banging music, try us and you'll love our other games on the Store !.

You try to balace the Hexagonon the tower of blocks of varying shaped bricks. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points. You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.

It sounds easy but it's actually not’t. The key point lies on physics principle. You have to destroy the tower block in the right direction to keep the hexagon balance with its all six edges.

If the removal of the blocks topples the tower or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then the game is over and you have to start all over again.

PS And only 1 Advert per Game which you can Fast Forward !
